name: Turf Roll
description:
An endless runner played on an ever faster rolling cube. Collect coins to accumulate your score and avoid getting squashed in the process!

Controls

  • WASD to move around
  • Q/E to rotate the player and camera

Assets by Kenney: https://kenney.nl/assets

Coin Sounds by fesliyanstudios: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-sound-effects-download/coin-272
